body:
Hi,
I know staff apps aren't open, but I have a question regarding the Skype interviews.
I'm not allowed to talk to others I don't know on Skype, will that be a problem with staff apps?
When the time comes, I would like to apply, as I can submit a post, but I just need this question answered first.

Thanks,
Sky
body_tagged:
Hi,
I know staff apps aren't open, but I have a question regarding the Skype interviews.
I'm not allowed to talk to others I don't know on Skype, will that be a problem with staff apps?

Thanks,
Sky
title: Staff application Skype interview

replies.body: If you are able to speak with people you don't know one time and never do it again, like call one time to do the interview, so, it's okay. But if you aren't able to speak with unknown people IRL on skype totally, so, that's a little problem.
replies.body_tagged: If you are able to speak with people you don't know one time and never do it again, like call one time to do the interview, so, it's okay. But if you aren't able to speak with unknown people IRL on skype totally, so, that's a little problem.

replies.body: Yeah, I can't actually speak at all with people I don't know on Skype. Because my parents are cyber-safety crazy.
replies.body_tagged: Yeah, I can't actually speak at all with people I don't know on Skype. Because my parents are cyber-safety crazy.

replies.body: I'm afraid without any verbal communication being the interview you may not become a staff member. You could just do it and tell them that it's one of your friends. And interviews are mainly done over teamspeak.
replies.body_tagged: I'm afraid without any verbal communication being the interview you may not become a staff member. You could just do it and tell them that it's one of your friends. And interviews are mainly done over teamspeak.

replies.body:
But you have the option to do the regular interview, TeamSpeak 3 interview(es) are very good, you don't need to add anyone on skype... but wherever you are, you will need talk too, sorry :/.
Just hide the true to your parents, if you are so surely for want be a staff member.



EDIT: Cupcakie ninja'd xD

But you have the option to do the regular interview, TeamSpeak 3 interview(es) are very good, you don't need to add anyone on skype... but wherever you are, you will need talk too, sorry :/.

EDIT: Cupcakie ninja'd xD

reply_to.body: Yeah, I can't actually speak at all with people I don't know on Skype. Because my parents are cyber-safety crazy.
reply_to.body_tagged: Yeah, I can't actually speak at all with people I don't know on Skype. Because my parents are cyber-safety crazy.

replies.body: Alright, thanks. Sorry to be pushy, but have there ever been any exceptions?
replies.body_tagged: Alright, thanks. Sorry to be pushy, but have there ever been any exceptions?

replies.body: just wait until your parents aren't home, that's what I did :P
replies.body_tagged: just wait until your parents aren't home, that's what I did :P

replies.body: That's what I do every time I record. :P
replies.body_tagged: That's what I do every time I record. :P

reply_to.body_tagged: That's what I do every time I record. :P

replies.body: You will be needing to talk over TeamSpeak when the time for interviews will come. It's important to talk. I think Skype is used only if you really cannot access TeamSpeak at that time. I'm not quite sure.
replies.body_tagged: You will be needing to talk over TeamSpeak when the time for interviews will come. It's important to talk. I think Skype is used only if you really cannot access TeamSpeak at that time. I'm not quite sure.

replies.body: I'm not sure, or atleast I heard it somewhere you were able to type.. Not 100% sure though...
replies.body_tagged: I'm not sure, or atleast I heard it somewhere you were able to type.. Not 100% sure though...

replies.body: That was the reason why I had to pull out of my interview.  Next time I am going do have a plan to get around my parents >:D
replies.body_tagged: That was the reason why I had to pull out of my interview.  Next time I am going do have a plan to get around my parents >:D

replies.body: I believe that you have to be able to speak to other people on the internet if you want to be a Moderator. It's mainly so the Mods can communicate easily. Are you allowed TeamSpeak?
replies.body_tagged: I believe that you have to be able to speak to other people on the internet if you want to be a Moderator. It's mainly so the Mods can communicate easily. Are you allowed TeamSpeak?

replies.body: <u></u>But when it comes to it, try to convince your parents first, because lying isn't really the best option..
replies.body_tagged: <u></u>But when it comes to it, try to convince your parents first, because lying isn't really the best option..

replies.body:
Interviews are supposed to be done on Teamspeak, but since zieno's teamspeak mic doesn't work the staff interviewed him on skype.

And yes, you do need to talk, I have never seen any exception. It's much harder to lie while talking with voice to the staff then to lie while typing.
replies.body_tagged:
Interviews are supposed to be done on Teamspeak, but since zieno's teamspeak mic doesn't work the staff interviewed him on skype.

And yes, you do need to talk, I have never seen any exception. It's much harder to lie while talking with voice to the staff then to lie while typing.
